definition[0]: a place where people make products, especially out of metal, using machines to cut and shape them
definition[1]: the place in a factory where products are made using machines
example[0]: One or two grinders in the machine shop have excessive maintenance costs.
example[1]: The new equipment was delivered and located in the East machine room.
definition[2]: a company, often a small one, that makes things using machines
example[2]: The new products will target machine shops and manufacturers of electrical equipment.
